hero.slogan: Drive in Style. Rent with Confidence

booking.acceptTermsError: You must accept the Terms & Conditions to proceed.

cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience.

policy.late: Delays beyond the agreed time may result in additional charges.
policy.clean: Excessive dirt or interior damage will result in a cleaning or repair fee.
policy.minRental: The minimum rental period is {{minRentalDays}} days.
policy.fuel: Vehicles are delivered with a full tank and must be returned full. Fuel charges will apply otherwise.
policy.smokePets: Smoking is not allowed inside vehicles. Pets are allowed only in carriers.
policy.traffic: Renters are responsible for any fines or violations during the rental period.

carHighlight.title: Our Masterpiece.
carHighlight.subtitle: Mercedes-Benz E200
carHighlight.description: Timeless elegance meets modern comfort. The E200 blends a sleek exterior with a refined interior featuring dual widescreen displays and ambient lighting. Powered by a smooth 1,6L turbo engine and 9-speed automatic, it offers a quiet, confident ride with smart safety features. Ideal for stylish city drives or comfortable long journeys.

items.question: Do you provide airport pick-up and drop-off?
items.answer: Yes! We offer professional airport transfer services to and from your terminal, ensuring a seamless and stylish start or end to your journey.

items.question: Is the car available for weddings and special events?
items.answer: Absolutely. The E200 is a popular choice for weddings, photo shoots, and VIP events. For more info please contact us directly.

items.question: Can I rent the car for everyday use or business trips?
items.answer: Yes. Whether you’re heading to a meeting or taking a road trip, our E200 rental provides luxury and advanced safety for all kinds of journeys.

items.question: What documents do I need to rent the car?
items.answer: You will need a valid driver’s license, a passport or ID, and a credit card. A €800 deposit will be pre-authorized and refunded if no damage occurs.

premium.description: At AutoMR, we are committed to delivering a premium car rental experience with clarity and trust. Please read the general terms carefully before renting a vehicle through our service.

premiumPlan.title: Premium Plan
premiumPlan.subtitle: Arrive in Style with the Mercedes-Benz E200
premiumPlan.description: Experience comfort, elegance, and convenience with our premium car rental services, featuring the luxurious 2020 Mercedes-Benz E200 – the perfect companion for any occasion.
features1: Dual widescreen infotainment and digital cockpit
Rear climate controls and ample legroom
features2: Full leather interior with ambient lighting

terms.title: AutoMR – General Rental Terms & Conditions
terms.airportPickup: Pickup from every public transportation is available upon request.
terms.licenseDesc: Accepted: Greek, EU or International license issued 4+ years prior.
terms.cardDesc: Required for deposit. Cash may be accepted upon approval.
terms.passportDesc: Documents must match primary driver’s name.
terms.reservationDesc: Deposit confirms booking. Balance is due at pickup.
